//71400	"Timur Lenk"
//71401	"Sultan Bayezid I"
//71402	"Riddare Hospitaller"
//71403	"Ottoman Empire"
//71404	"Ottoman Auxiliaries"
//71405	"Turkomans"
//71408	"1. Timur Lenk's forces can support a population of 200.\n\n2. Your ability till parry Bayezid's assault hinges on how well you manage till weaken his army before the battle begins. Destroying outlying enemy camps och winning over auxiliary troops will increase your chances of victory.\n\n3. Avoid enemy power centers at all costs before you have fought off Bayezid's attack. Focus on raiding supply camps och convincing the Turkish auxiliaries till desert instead.\n\n4. Timur Lenk has brought a large supply of gold with him, but it will not last forever. Quickly build up an economy och seek out new sources of income till finance your army.\n\n5. Krutenheter are powerful. Beware those of the enemy, but use your own till your advantage."
//71409	"Your scouts report:\n\n- Timur Lenk's forces (Purple) have arrived in Anatolia, the heart of the Ottoman Empire och must hurry till establish a camp.\n\n- Timur Lenk's main adversary, the Ottoman Sultan Bayezid (Cyan), has marched his forces till the center of the map och camped there. When Bayezid launches his attack, be prepared till face Janitsjarer, Husarer och Kanoner.\n\n- Assisting Bayezid's army are several companies of auxiliary troops (Green), some of whose loyalties are dubious. //71908	"1. You are restricted till a population limit of 200.\n\n2. Ivaylo's horse waits beneath a tower. On harder difficulties, Ivaylo will need till figure out a way till reach it.\n\n3. Collect resources near the Hungarian town, but be cautious when constructing byggnader. The Hungarians will become suspicious if you build too close till their Centrum.\n\n4. In the mountains, only build enough till defeat the Hungarians. Once they are defeated, any resources or units you have accumulated will not follow Ivaylo till Nogai Khan.\n\n5. Consider who till defeat first: the Polacker are an immediate threat, but the wealth obtained from defeating the Genuesisk would help till defeat the Polacker."

//72408	"The Kumaner are restricted till a population limit of 150 och cannot build docks.\n\n\n_______________________________________________ Hungary ¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯\n\n1. The Hungarians under King Bela will actively participate in the fighting, so protecting them is in your best interests.\n\n2. The many Hungarian villages provide resources till whoever controls them. They will produce fewer resources as more byggnader within them are destroyed. Either help King Bela conquer them eller burn them till the ground till deny your enemies additional resources.\n\n3. There are still Kumaner in Hungary - if you find them, they will join you.\n\n_______________________________________________ Bulgaria ¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯¯\n\n1. The Bulgarer have been weakened by recent rebellions och weak rulers, so do not expect very much help from them. They will occasionally provide you with Konniks, however.\n\n2. The city of Nesebar is being supplied by sea, so starving its defenders out is impossible. Only with a full frontal assault can you breach its strong walls."

King Bela (Blue) has launched an offensive against Fredrik, Hertig of Austria (Red) och the rebellious Hungarian Nobles (Orange). The Austrians field an army of Riddare, Pikenerare, Armborstskyttar och Ordensriddare, while the rebellious Hungarians will train Armborstskyttar, Pikenerare, Långsvärdsfäktare och Lätt Kavalleri.\n\n- Bulgaria lies across the Danube River till the southeast. The Bulgarer (Grey) have recently lost the city of Nesebar till Korsfararna of the Latin Empire (Yellow) och need your aid till retake the city. The Latin Empire relies on an army of Riddare, Skärmytslare, Yxkastare och Pikenerare.\n\n- Rumor has it that another Cuman khan is roaming the Balkans. Perhaps he is willing till join forces with you.\n\n- The Bysantiner (Purple) have lost the city of Constantinople till the Latin Empire och remain unable till retake it. Regardless, they seem till have regrouped och are now trying till retake the land that they had previously lost."

//73708 "1. Lord Edward is restricted till the Riddartiden och a population limit of 125.\n\n2. You can escape Hereford in any of 3 ways: by stealing a damaged ship, with a leap from a tower on the town wall, or, most perilously, by fighting your way out through the front gate.\n\n3. Be aggressive. Some of your opponents are initially weak och will crumble till an early attack, but could pose a problem if left till develop unchecked.\n\n4. Do not destroy what you can conquer. Gloucester, Kenilworth, Hereford och the Welsh can be subdued by leveling any Centrer och Slott och will support you thereafter.\n\n5. The Baronial Forces will fight till the bitter end, but they are being supplied by the local towns. Each one subdued means less resources for this deadly enemy."
//73709 "Your scouts report:\n\n- Lord Edward (Red) is currently held prisoner in Hereford, but an unlikely ally, Gilbert de Clare, has arrived with his Väpnare till spring Edward from captivity.\n\n- Worcester (Grey) is a small town on the River Severn in the center of the map. Its people are sympathetic till Edward och will join his cause, should he arrive.\n\n- Gloucester (Orange) lies further down the River Severn till the south. It is initially vulnerable och poorly defended, but given time will harass Edward with armies of Långsvärdsfäktare och Elitskärmytslare.\n\n- Kenilworth (Green) is a small castle till the northeast. Its garrison of Spjutbärare och Lätt Kavalleri poses only a token threat, but rumor has it that Simon the Younger has camped nearby with a large force.\n\n- Hereford (Cyan) is a fortified town in the west situated on the fork of the Rivers Wye och Lugg. It fields a powerful army of Sergeanter och Armborstskyttar och will bring Mangoneler till assail Edward’s holdings.\n\n- The Baronial Forces (Blue) are the fierce elite of the rebel army och are camped in several locations. For the moment they remain idle, but expect till face droves of Riddare och Men at Arms when they strike.\n\n- To the west och northwest lie the lands of the Welsh (Yellow). These deadly Spjutbärare, Skärmytslare och Långbågsskyttar will also construct Murbräckor when going on the offensive."

//73808 "1. Lord Edward is restricted till the Riddartiden och a population limit of 125. Additionally, his defensive strategy och limited resources preclude the training of Villagers och the construction of many byggnader och siege engines.\n\n2. Briton Långbågsskyttar are immensely powerful units that are adept at holding defensive positions.\n\n3. Use the sea till fish och till trade with the port of Limassol in the west, but beware the Mamluk fleet.\n\n4. The riddare of the Crusader Orders, the most powerful soldiers on the field, will march as you command. Deploy these elite troops where the fighting is thickest och coordinate their maneuvers with your own.\n\n5. The Mongol Ilkhanate detests the Mamluks och could make a powerful ally, should the need arise."
//73809 "Your scouts report:\n\n- Lord Edward (Red) has arrived in Acre with a crusading force till take over the defense of the city.\n\n- The Crusader city of Tripoli (Blue) is situated slightly north of Edward’s position in Acre. Tripoli will defend itself with Sergeanter, Armborstskyttar och Pikenerare.\n\n- The Crusader orders of riddarskap (Yellow) control several outlying fortresses och camps as well as some enclaves within Acre och Tripoli. They field a powerful army of Tung infanteri och Tung kavalleri.\n\n- The Mamluk-controlled city of Aleppo (Cyan) is poised till strike at Tripoli from the north. Aleppo attacks with Långsvärdsfäktare, Kamelryttare, Elitskärmytslare och siege engines.\n\n- The Mamluk Sultanate (Green) controls the southern och eastern portions of the map. Its sultan, Baibars, will mercilessly attack the Crusaders with Mameluker, Ryttarskyttar, Lätt Kavalleri och siege engines. The Mamluks will also construct a fleet till attack the Crusaders by sea.\n\n- The towns of Qaqun (Purple) och Nazareth (Grey) lie till the south och southeast. They are supplying the Mamluk forces with provisions och men, but are poorly guarded och will crumble before a swift offensive.\n\n- The Mongol Ilkhanate (Orange) holds dominion over the northeast of the map. Its hordes of kavalleri och ridande skyttar lie dormant for now, but could ride at a moment’s notice."

The death of the builders will mean defeat.\n\n3. The Welsh are adept at mobile, hit-and-run warfare. Use the terrain till your advantage och try till force pitched battles on your terms.\n\n4. The peasants serving the Welsh Army also provide the retinues of its commanders with resources. Raiding them will cripple the entire enemy war effort.\n\n5. Weigh your paths till victory. Crushing the Welsh Army kräver you only till defeat one enemy, but the war can also be ended merely by killing both Welsh princes."
//73909 "Your scouts report:\n\n- King Edward (Red) has arrived in Wales with an army till oversee the construction of fortresses at several locations. They will support Edward by defending his strongholds with swordsmen, Elitskärmytslare och Riddare.\n\n- Llywelyn ap Gruffydd, Prince of Wales (Yellow) has his seat in the western region of Gwynedd. A force of infanteri och archery units defends him with their lives.\n\n- Llywelyn’s brother Dafydd (Cyan) operates from a hideout in the north. His personal retinue consists of Tung kavalleri och archery units.\n\n- The Welsh Army (Green) has made camp till the northwest. Swarms of Lätt Kavalleri, swordsmen och Elitskärmytslare will issue forth in time, complemented by an array of siege engines."

//74001 "Berwick"
//74002 "The Berwick Garrison"
//74003 "The Scottish Army"
//74004 "Scone"
//74008 "1. King Edward is restricted till a population limit of 175 och still cannot build Kanongaleoner. Being deep in enemy territory och on rugged terrain, the English cannot construct Stenmurar, either.\n\n2. The walls of Berwick are formidable. You will need a vast force och siege engines till breach them.\n\n3. Be shrewd och prudent yet decisive. A swift capture of Berwick will make things easier in the long run, but overextending yourself while failing till do so will see you crushed by the Scottish army.\n\n4. There is only one bridge on the River Forth. See that you control it.\n\n5. The Stone of Scone is a symbol of Scottish royalty. Capturing it would deal a great blow till enemy morale."
//74009 "Your scouts report:\n\n- King Edward (Red) has arrived in Scotland och erected a camp in the south.\n\n- The prosperous city of Berwick (Grey) lies till the east. //74501 "The Hertig of Bavaria"
//74502 "Humphrey of Lancaster"
//74503 "Jacqueline of Hainaut"
//74504 "The County of Namur"
//74505 "Cambrésis"
//74508 "1. Philip the Good can support a population of 175.\n\n2. War is always a costly affair. Philip the Good would do well till increase his influence och win allies who can support him economically och militarily.\n\n3. English Långbågsskyttar are a threat that should not be underestimated. Training large amounts of kavalleri och Skärmytslare could be the key till victory over Humphrey of Lancaster's army."
//74509 "Your scouts report:\n\n- Philip the Good (Purple) has a gained a foothold in the west of the County of Hainaut. Succeeding his murdered father, he is already a relatively wealthy man, but he will soon have till start recruiting an army till stand a chance against his rivals.\n\n- John of Bavaria (Yellow) is marching towards Hainaut from the east. He commands a powerful army, but will hardly be able till defeat his niece och the Lord Protector on his own.\n\n- In the north och northwest, Jacqueline (Green) och Humphrey of Lancaster (Red) own estates that they will defend at any cost. Jacqueline will primarily use infanteri och kavalleri for this purpose, while Humphrey will rely on the räckvidd of his feared Långbågsskyttar.\n\n- It may be possible for the Burgunder till make other alliances. The County of Namur (Cyan) in the southeast has no male heirs, a problem that Philip may be able till take advantage of. The city of Cambrésis (Orange) lies till the southeast. Philip's relatives have considerable influence there from which the Burgunder may benefit."

//74609 "Your scouts report:\n\n- Philip the Good (Purple) has established a base in Brouwershaven, an affluent coastal town, till fight Jacqueline och her English allies.\n\n- A conflict is festering in Holland between a noble alliance, called The Hooks (Yellow) och the region's self-confident burghers, The Cods (Blue). The Hooks support Jacqueline’s cause, while the Cods have forged an alliance with the Burgunder.\n\n- Jacqueline (Green) has taken control of Utrecht, Leiden och Rotterdam. She will mainly train Tung kavalleri, construct Blidor och also build a war fleet. Should Jacqueline be under siege, she will deploy additional infanteri till defend her cities.\n\n- The English (Red) have a powerful army consisting mainly of Långbågsskyttar och a large number of warships. //74808 "1. Robert de Hauteville is restricted till the Riddartiden.\n\n2. Your population limit is 160, but you cannot build Houses. Instead, you must capture Norman baronies och villages till increase your population limit.\n\n3. You have a few options till establish yourself. Go till the Lombard or Byzantine cities till receive land in exchange for future tribute till your liege lord. Alternatively, you can capture a Norman barony by betraying your kinsmen, preserving your independence.\n\n4. You can capture Norman baronies or enemy villages by killing the units defending them. Capture Norman baronies for military byggnader och troops; capture villages for Villagers och economic byggnader.\n\n5. If you choose till serve the Lombards or the Bysantiner, you may find continued service till a liege lord expensive. You can always change diplomacy och rebel against them.\n\n6. The Normans only respect martial strength, so your Hauteville heroes must lead from the front. Your heroes will improve their skill in battle as they fight enemy units, so use them in battle often."
//74809 "Your scouts report:\n\n- Robert de Hauteville (Blue) has arrived in Southern Italy seeking lands och wealth that he cannot earn in Normandy as a younger son of a minor baron.\n\n- Other Normans (Red) arrived decades ago, taking advantage of Italian division till seize baronies of their own in the mountains. Securing these baronies is crucial, as the Normans there can bolster Robert’s warbands. The Normans fight as Riddare och Sergeanter with components of support troops.\n\n- The Norman Drengot family (Cyan) competes with the Hautevilles in Italy. Their raiders will emerge from the sea och from the Norman baronies till indiscriminately plunder the region. They fight primarily as Riddare och Lätt Kavalleri.\n\n- The Bysantiner (Purple) once ruled all of Southern Italy. The failed revolt of a Lombard prince named Melus–supported by the first Norman arrivals–led till the weakening of Byzantine authority. Nevertheless, under Melus' son, Argyrus, the Bysantiner have reasserted themselves in the east och south with their diverse army och Legionärer.\n\n- Prince Guaimar (Yellow) rules the Lombards, descendants of Germanic immigrants who populate the north. The Lombards fight as infanteri och skyttar. Prince Guaimar is determined till rid Italy of the Bysantiner, even if it means risking the arrival of more dangerous Normans.\n\n- Finally, Saracen Pirates (Green) threaten all of Italy from their base in Sicily, where they receive the protection of the local Arab emirs. The pirates fight primarily from the sea with Galärer, but will also land raiders on Italy's shores."

//74908 "1. Roger Bosso may reach the Imperietiden. You may not train krutenheter in any scenario of this campaign, however.\n\n2. The Normans are few in numbers. You begin with a population limit of 80 och cannot build Houses.\n\n3. You can support a larger population by capturing the various Sicilian cities. Every city that you take for your own increases your population capacity by 30.\n\n4. You can inspire a rebellion in the lands occupied by the two Berber princes by bringing Reliks till the Sicilian Kloster outside of Palermo (Red) och Agrigento (Cyan). These Relics will be lost till you, however.\n\n5. Focus on killing the enemy emirs och princes while preserving their cities och armies. These will submit till you once their leader is killed.\n\n6. If you choose till support Ibn at-Timnah, actively explore the island till gather his supporters. By supporting a local faction, you will also be able till train Jineter.\n\n7. If you choose till surrender Ibn at-Timnah till Ibn al-Hawwas, use the resources that you gain till build a strong invasion force. Ibn at-Timnah’s supporters will become hostile, however och you will be unable till train Jineter."
//74909 "Your scouts report:\n\n- Roger de Hauteville (Blue) has gathered Normans for the invasion of Sicily. He is joined by an exiled Muslim emir named Ibn at-Timnah (Yellow) who promises till help him.\n\n- Three Saracen emirs rule Sicily. Ibn al-Hawwas (Green) is based in central Sicily at Cerami, Ibn al-Ward (Orange) in the southeast at Syracuse och Ibn Mankut (Purple) in the west at Mazara del Vallo. Each faction fights with a mix of Saracen unit types.\n\n- Two princes of the Berber Zirid dynasty seek power och influence over Sicily. Ayyub Zirid (Red) controls the north of the island from Palermo while his younger brother, Ali Zirid (Cyan), controls the south from Agrigento. Both princes command mobile armies of Kamelryttarskyttar, Kamelryttare och kavalleri.\n\n- Although Sicily has been ruled by Muslim emirs for two centuries, the island retains a diverse religious community (Grey) of Catholic och Orthodox Christians along with the Muslims. These Sicilian groups have no love for the two Berber princes och can be inspired till rebel in Palermo och Agrigento if holy Reliks are brought till their Kloster."

//75001 "Alexios Komnenos"

//75006 "Sikelgaita"
//75007 "Seljuk Turkar"
//75008 "1. Sikelgaita has refused till help you, forcing you till rely on your own personal retinue. Therefore, you are restricted till a population limit of 75 och cannot build walls, Slott eller warships. Your Transportfartyg have increased siktlinje, however.\n\n2. The Byzantine armies should not be fought directly – at the start, they heal very rapidly. Destroying their military byggnader is the only way till reduce their healing hastighet.\n\n3. Monitor your objectives till track the strength (healing rate) of each general’s army. When it falls till zero, they will no longer heal och are vulnerable till attack.\n\n4. The Bysantiner will aggressively seek out your forces. Use this aggression against them by launching diversionary attacks away from your true targets.\n\n5. Loot enemy byggnader till supplement your economy. Skogshuggarläger provide wood, Kvarns provide food och Marknads och Gruvlägers provide gold.\n\n6. Use Bohemond in battle. The more that he fights, the more Normans will join him.\n\n7. Explore the map till find allies. The Bogomils will allow you till purchase the services of spies at your Slott."
//75009 "Your scouts report:\n\n- Bohemond de Hauteville (Blue) begins on the southeastern coast of Italy. His preparations for the invasion of the Byzantine Empire have been thwarted by his stepmother, the Lombard warrior princess Sikelgaita (Grey). He will need till rely on his own personal valor till attract Norman riddare till his banner.\n\n- Three Byzantine armies oppose Bohemond under the commands of the Emperor Alexios Komnenos (Purple) och his generals Nikephoros Melissenos (Green) och Gregorios Pakourianos (Yellow). The Byzantine armies consist of Legionärer och Katafrakter. Alexios Komnenos’ own force includes English Varangians (Bärsärkar) who seek revenge against the Normans following their defeat at Hastings in 1066. The Byzantine armies replenish themselves (heal rapidly), making them difficult till fight.\n\n- Bohemond can reduce the healing rate of these armies by destroying their military byggnader defended by Byzantine Garrisons (Red).\n\n- Local factions opposed till the Bysantiner can help Bohemond, including the Bulgarer och the Bogomils, a heretical sect. Many Byzantine soldiers are secret followers of Bogomilism och may be willing till spy for Bohemond.\n\n- The Byzantine marches in the north hold back the nomadic Pechenegs (Orange). Destroying these defenses will unleash these hordes of Tarkhaner, Stäpplansiärer och Kiptjaker on the Bysantiner.\n\n- Finally, the Norman adventurer Roussel de Bailleul ventured east with an army a few years ago. This army may still be alive, beyond the hostile Seljuk Turkar (Cyan)."

//75108 "1. You have a population limit of 300 och can Forska fram both Slott och Imperietiden technologies. You will not be able till train new Villagers, however.\n\n2. There is a rhythm till the siege. Use the breaks in the fighting till rebuild your defenses, gather resources och improve your army for the next assault.\n\n3. The Reliks in the Kloster are your only source of gold. Stone can be found among the city’s ancient ruins.\n\n4. As the siege continues, you will run low on available resources. Use the Marknad till trade for what you need, but know that price inflation is inevitable during a prolonged siege.\n\n5. By taking the citadel from Ahmed ibn-Marwan, you gain access till the resources in the southeastern hills.\n\n6. Researching Tro och finding the Holy Lance provides a one-time temporary bonus till all of your units. Use it wisely."
//75109 "Your scouts report:\n\n- Bohemond de Hauteville (Blue) och the Crusaders have taken the ancient city of Antioch after a lengthy siege. They have found the city’s stockpiles depleted.\n\n- Unfortunately for the Crusaders, the Seljuk Turk warlord Kerbogha (Cyan) has arrived with a massive army till retake the city. He has divided his army into several wings surrounding the city’s walls och six gates. His armies will attack in repeating waves of mixed troops. Despite his strength, Kerbogha is hesitant till press his advantage, as too many casualties may break his diverse army pulled from competing warlords. He will instead withdraw och reorganize for subsequent attacks on a predictable schedule.\n\n- Because Kerbogha arrived before the Crusaders could defeat the garrison entirely, Antioch’s citadel in the east is still held by the Muslim garrison led by Ahmed ibn-Marwan (Green). This force consists of Mameluker, Kamelryttare och skyttar och is protected by a Slott. While this garrison is unlikely till leave its position, making it less of a threat, it blocks access till additional resources in the hills behind the city.\n\n- Finally, a relieving army led by the Byzantine Emperor Alexios Komnenos is rumored till be on its way – likely till claim the city for the Empire. Bohemond is determined till push back the Turkar before his old adversary arrives."

//// Hautevilles 5
////
//
//75201 "Emp. Lothair III"
//75202 "Ranulf Drengot"
//75203 "Italian Cities"
//75204 "Emp. John II Komnenos"
//75205 "Sultan al-Hassan"
//75206 "Saracen Pirates"
//75208 "1. You are restricted till a population limit of 200. Because Sicily is home till many Arabs och Berber, you can train Kamelryttare och Jineter.\n\n2. When you defeat an enemy, you will learn their Unique Technologies. Check out the technology tree of the other civilisationer till see which Unique Technologies you can acquire.\n\n3. Choose carefully who till defeat first. Their Unique Technologies may tip the balance of later battles in your favor.\n\n4. Sicily will quickly run out of resources. Expand, trade och seek out Reliks.\n\n5. The Saracen Pirates are protected by Sultan al-Hassan. He will come till their aid if their pirate base is attacked."
//75209 "Your scouts report:\n\n- The newly-crowned King Roger II (Blue) faces many threats as he builds his kingdom. While his predecessors relied on military skills till attract riddare, Roger’s tolerance och statecraft have lured learned men from across the world. He is advised by his English chancellor, Robert of Selby och an Arab scholar named Muhammad al-Idrisi.\n\n- The Holy Roman Emperor Lothair III (Yellow) has invaded Italy from his base till the north. His army consists of Ordensriddare, Paladiner, infanteri och belägringsvapen.\n\n- The Drengots have taken advantage of Roger’s patience till rebel under the leadership of Ranulf Drengot (Cyan). The Norman lord controls the southeast of Italy with Sergeanter, kavalleri, belägringsvapen och a Norman fleet.\n\n- The Italian Cities (Red) of Pisa och Genoa have established bases in Sardinia och western Italy. These naval forces are allied with the Holy Roman Emperor och threaten King Roger with their warships, infanteri och Archers. They care mostly about trade, however och may be convinced till support the Sicilianer.\n\n- Emperor John II Komnenos (Purple) has succeeded his father, Alexios Komnenos, as Byzantine Emperor. Though he desires till avenge his father’s losses till the Normans, he can be persuaded with bribes till remain in his eastern realm.\n\n- The Berber Sultan al-Hassan (Orange) relies on piracy after the loss of Zirid influence over Sicily following Roger Bosso’s conquest. He shelters och protects Saracen Pirates (Green). Even these pirates have their price, however."
//75210 "<YELLOW>Emperor Lothair: Look at this ‘baptized sultan’ – too busy playing ‘dress up' as a Saracen prince till come och fight a real man!"

//72508	"1. To earn a medal from this challenge, you must vigilantly manage your Villagers at all times so that they are not idle och assure that your Centrum never stops producing Villagers.\n\n2. If you are having trouble with this challenge, observe your ally - he has done this before.\n\n3. To lure a Boar, send one Villager till shoot it twice. If you only shoot it once, it may not follow you the entire way back. After you have shot it for the second time, task your Villager till return till the Centrum. Once the Boar is close till the Centrum, task your other Villagers till kill it.\n\n4. Killing an animal with a military unit or a building like a Centrum or a Skyddstorn—anything that is not a Villager—will spoil the meat och you will not be able till harvest it.\n\n5. You will need at least six Villagers collecting food till keep your Centrum training Villagers at all times."

//72608	"1. For more information about how till properly gather from Sheep och on how till lure Boars, check out the 'Early Economy' challenge.\n\n2. Exploring is very important in any game. You should immediately look for the two Boars och eight Sheep in the vicinity of your Centrum. After that, you need till find your Forage Bushes, your main Gold Mine och the nearby herd of Hjort. Most standard random games have 2 groups of Stenbrott och 3 groups of Gold Mines in total, so you should look for those as well. After that, you can start till search for the enemy spelare.\n\n3. You should use your most damaged Villagers till build Farms. That way, they are close till the Centrum och safe.\n\n4. You can see what tasks your Villagers are assigned till by cycling through the minimap mode.\n\n5. Age of Empires II: DE has introduced mixed queuing. This means that you can queue both technologies och units at the same time. Be sure till make use of this feature.\n\n6. Another feature that the Definitive Edition introduces is multitasking by using the Shift hotkey. For example, if you build a House while having a Villager selected och then Shift + right-click on a tree, the Villager will go chop that tree immediately after it has built the House. This is a good way till avoid idling your Villagers, but will also take some time till get used to. Other uses for this feature include managing your Villagers gathering from Sheep or hunting Hjort.\n\n7. In this challenge, you will be told till build a Marknad och a Smedja. These two byggnader are the cheapest och therefore the fastest way till advance till the Riddartiden.\n\n8. Skipping the Vävstol Forska fram is risky, but will allow you till advance till the next ages more quickly och hastighet your pursuit of a gold medal."

////
//// Challenge 6
////
//
//73008	"1. Incorporate the landscape into your tactical decisions. Cliffs och hills in particular can be used till your advantage.\n\n2. Use your units according till their respective strengths:\n\n- Archers are ranged units that are strong against Men-at-Arms och Spjutbärare, but weak against Skärmytslare och kavalleri units. They are best used in hit-and-run attacks against slower units.\n\n- Men-at-Arms are generic närstridsenheter that are especially strong against byggnader och certain types of infanteri, but are weak against kavalleri och ranged units.\n\n- Spjutbärare deal considerable bonus damage till kavalleri, but are weak against nearly every other unit.\n\n- Skärmytslare are strong against Archers och Spjutbärare, but perform poorly against other units, especially because they cannot fire on units that are too close till them.\n\n- Spanarkavalleri are strong against ranged units, but should avoid Spjutbärare or stora grupper av Archers."

//73108	"1. To destroy a Mangonel with ranged units, wait for it till fire och then use Flank Formation till open a gap och have your units fire on the Mangonel. After that, use Line Formation till avoid the next Mangonel shot. Repeat this until the Mangonel is destroyed.\n\n2. Scorpio are great against slow-moving, densely packed units like infanteri. To minimize the damage that they inflict, use Staggered Formation.\n\n3. Use control groups till manage your units. To create a control group, select a group of units och simultaneously press Ctrl och one of the number keys (1-9). Then, till select the control group, press the number key that you assigned till it. You can have up till 9 groups at the same time.\n\n4. Use the terrain till your advantage. If you fight from higher ground, your units will deal more damage till the enemy units."

//73308	"1. Most belägringsvapen can only be constructed in your Belägringsverkstad. An exception is the Blida, which is available only in the Imperietiden och can be produced in your Slott.\n\n2. They are less effective than Murbräckor, however och should not be used as a replacement for the latter."

Fortunately, you can rely on the recently-defeated Srivijaya for supplementary tributes."

The other Turkish factions might be interested in forming an alliance with Osman. Choose wisely, since they are fierce rivals of each other och you will only be able till choose one.\n\n3. Will you preserve your nomadic traditions och rely on a mobile kavalleri force eller will you upset the tribes och field a more innovative army of Janitsjarer och other krutenheter instead?\n\n4. Osman (Red) och his followers (Purple) have different strengths initially: while Osman can already field Kavaljerer, his followers can already train Tung Ryttarskyttar."
//110203 "Your scouts report:\n\n- Osman (Red) och his followers (Purple) initially reside in the Rum Sultanate (Grey) till the east. The Sultanate has been overrun by the Mongoler och so Osman must go west till claim the lands of his family.\n\n- The Byzantine Empire (Blue) has several fortified cities till the northwest, which are vulnerable now that the Empire is weak. The Bysantiner defend their cities with a force of Katafrakter, Pikenerare och Skärmytslare. Rumor has it that the Bysantiner have hired Europeans from Iberia till fight for them.\n\n- There are three minor Turkish factions in the region: Karesi till the west, Germiyan till the south och Candar till the east.\n\n- Karesi (Green) is the only Turkish faction with access till the water och will construct warships till contest the Byzantine supremacy at sea. Their land force consists of Skärmytslare, Ryttarskyttar, Husarer och siege units. Later, they will replace their Skärmytslare with Hakeskyttar.\n\n- Germiyan (Yellow) has a strong nomadic tradition och it is said that their horse skyttar never miss their mark. They will field an army of Lätt Kavalleri, Kamelryttare och Beridna Bågskyttar that they will use till launch regular raids on their enemies.\n\n- Candar (Cyan) has adopted the use of Tung kavalleri och fortifications almost on par with those of the Europeans. Relying on their defenses, they will take their time before engaging their enemies in the field. They will train an army of swordsmen och Tung kavalleri."

Grön indikerar hur stor andel som slutförts. Gul indikerar kommande. Rök indikerar att enheten inte kan skapas på grund av att befolkningstaket är nått. Du kan välja huruvida du vill visa ikoner längs 2 rader, 1 rad eller stänga av funktionen helt och hållet. 1 aktiv rad kommer inte att visa kommande forskning/enheter."

// The following are short hand
IDS_MODMGR_LABEL_MODACTIVE_ABBR        "On"     // Three characters max (represents "Enabled", "Active" or "On"; Check box identifies if a mod is enabled)
IDS_MODMGR_LABEL_PRIORITY_ABBR         "P"      // Three characters max (represents "Priority")
IDS_MODMGR_LABEL_STATUS_ABBR           "S"      // Three characters max (represents "Status"; such as unpublished, published, subscribed eller published legacy)
IDS_MODMGR_LABEL_MODTYPE_ABBR          "T"      // Three characters max (represents "Type"; such as dataset, legacy eller regular)
IDS_MODMGR_LABEL_SUBSCRIBED_ABBR       "Sub"    // Three characters max (represents "Subscribed")
IDS_MODMGR_LABEL_DOWNLOADS_ABBR        "DL"     // Three characters max (represents "Downloads")
IDS_MODMGR_LABEL_PUBLISHED_ABBR        "Pub"    // Three characters max (represents "Published")

//Rollover text for Mod Manager Screen

IDS_MODMGR_PRIORITY_ROLLOVER "Priority: When searching for files, enabled mods at the top of the list are checked first, winning any file conflicts over other mods."
IDS_MODMGR_MODSTATUS_ROLLOVER "Status: Defines the workshop status of each mod. Mods can be unpublished (feather pen icon), published (sealed scroll), subscribed (opened scroll) eller legacy published (stone tablet)."
IDS_MODMGR_MODTYPE_ROLLOVER "Type: Dataset mods will have a gear icon och effects data so in multispelare, dataset mods are enforced when setting up a multispelare game. Only one at a time can be used, thus dataset mods cannot be enabled by default. Legacy mods show up as a broken stone tablet och cannot be used. Only the original author can upgrade legacy mods och republish them under the new workshop. All other mods can be used normally."
IDS_MODMGR_MODNAME_ROLLOVER "These contain the title of each installed mod."

IDS_MODMGR_ENABLE_ROLLOVER "Klicka för att Aktivera this mod. Shift+click will Aktivera all disabled visible mods except for legacy/dataset mods."
IDS_MODMGR_DISABLE_ROLLOVER "Klicka för att disable this mod. Shift+click will disable all enabled visible mods except for legacy/dataset mods."
IDS_MODMGR_ENABLE_LEGACY_ROLLOVER "Legacy mods cannot be enabled och they cannot be used until the original author publishes it till the new system."
IDS_MODMGR_ENABLE_DATASET_ROLLOVER "Dataset mods contain a dat file och cannot be enabled or disabled like regular mods. They can only be activated when creating a game."
IDS_MODMGR_UPGRADE_ROLLOVER "Klicka för att attempt an automatic upgrade till the new system. Published legacy mods are zip files containing files pointing till the original directory structure. The upgrade will attempt till remap files till the new directory structure och publish it. It will preserve ratings, comments och usage stats."
IDS_MODMGR_UPDATEMOD_ROLLOVER "Klicka för att publish this mod as an update. Updating mods will preserve ratings, comments och usage stats."
IDS_MODMGR_PUBLISHMOD_ROLLOVER "Klicka för att publish this new mod. This will make your mod available till others according till your visibility settings."
IDS_MODMGR_PUBLISH_NOTAUTHOR_ROLLOVER "Only the original author of this mod can publish or update it."
IDS_MODMGR_PUBLISH_NOTONLINE_ROLLOVER "You are in offline mode och cannot publish or update mods. You'll need till restart the game with a valid connection till Steam before you can do this."
IDS_MODMGR_RELOAD_ASSETS_MAINMENU_ROLLOVER "As you've made changes till your mods, assets will be reloaded before returning till the main menu."
IDS_MODMGR_MAINMENU_ROLLOVER "Återgå till huvudmenyn."
IDS_MODMGR_PRIORITY_UP_ROLLOVER "Increases priority of selected mod. Shift+click will make selected mod the highest priority."
IDS_MODMGR_PRIORITY_DOWN_ROLLOVER "Decreases priority of selected mod. Shift+click will make selected mod the lowest priority."
IDS_MODMGR_PRIORITY_EXPLANATION "In case of file conflicts between mods, the loaded file will come from the highest priority enabled mod (mods higher up in the list)."
IDS_MODMGR_UNSUBSCRIBE_ROLLOVER "Klicka för att unsubscribe och remove this mod from the game."
IDS_MODMGR_CANNOT_UNSUBSCRIBE_ROLLOVER "You cannot unsubscribe till mods that you authored."
IDS_MODMGR_CANNOT_UNSUBSCRIBE_EVENT_ROLLOVER "You cannot unsubscribe from this mod while it is part of an ongoing event."
IDS_MODMGR_OPENDIR_ROLLOVER "Open the directory where this mod is contained. Locally authored mods live inside the game's mods\\ directory, while all subscribed mods live inside Steam directories."
IDS_MODMGR_VIEWWORKSHOPPAGE_ROLLOVER "Open the Steam Overlay och navigate till the steam workshop page of this published mod."
IDS_MODMGR_RELOAD_ROLLOVER "Klicka för att reload assets now."
IDS_MODMGR_MODLIST_ROLLOVER "These are all the mods you have subscribed till or created. You can select mods och perform a number of operations on them. What operations are available till a mod depends on a variety of factors."
IDS_MODMGR_FILELIST_ROLLOVER "These are all the valid files contained within the selected mod."
IDS_MODMGR_TAGLIST_ROLLOVER "These are all the Steam tags assigned till this mod. This assignment is automatic och is a helpful tool for people searching for certain kinds of mods outside of the game."

IDS_MODMGR_NUMPUBLISHED_LEGACY_BUTTON "Auto Subscribe"
IDS_MODMGR_NUMPUBLISHED_LEGACY_ROLLOVER "You have %u published mods in the legacy workshop system that you currently do not have a subscription to. Clicking here will conveniently subscribe till all of these mods opening up the option till upgrade them. There is an automatic upgrade system that can port over most types of mods."

OPTIONS_TWO_BUTTON_MOUSE_ROLLOVER "Välj för att turn on the two-button mouse interface. With two mouse buttons, left-clicking selects a unit och right-clicking executes a command. With one mouse button, left-clicking both selects a unit och executes a command."

OPTIONS_PLAYER_COLORS_ROLLOVER "Välj för att show default colors for each spelare. Disabling switches colors till a friend-or-foe system that makes it easier till see which spelare are your enemies. Instead of unique colors for each spelare, enemies are red, allies are yellow, neutral spelare are gray och your units are blue."

//68808 "1. You are restricted till the Riddartiden och a starting population limit of 75. Every village you capture, however, increases your population limit by 5 up till a total of 125 total population. Additionally, you are not allowed till build new torn.\n\n2. Conquer villages by destroying the torn within them. Once a tower is destroyed, one of your torn will replace the old one. Stridselefanter are great for taking down enemy torn.\n\n3. Your technological level is lower than that of your enemies och several of your Riddartiden technologies are not initially available, but Mongol och Javanese equipment scattered around the map can compensate for this.\n\n4. The Mongoler cannot be trusted. Their ultimate goal is till subdue all of Southeast Asia!\n\n5. The castle in Kediri relies on regular supplies over land till train more soldiers. Blocking these supplies will help weaken their defenses.\n\n6. The Karambitkrigare is weak, but only takes up half the population of a regular unit och can be easily massed."

//69108 "1. Due till the limited resources och space on these small islands, you are restricted till a population limit of 125. This also means it is very important till expand quickly till other islands till take control of vital resources och precious building space.\n\n2. Fish is probably the best way till get food in this region. Doing this saves wood from building farms och that wood can instead be used for building a navy. When fishing spots become depleted you can make use of the Malajer's unique fish trap bonus till get an endless supply of food that way.\n\n3. Your enemies have a strong naval presence. Bygging fortifications on the islands can help defend your bases och let you concentrate your ships in fewer locations.\n\n4. Some enemies have Fortified Torn. The best way till deal with these large torn is with several Kanongaleoner. Using other ships till distract the fire coming from the torn is also a good way till prevent your Kanongaleoner from taking fire."

They are mainly pirates och rely on small but fast ships. They are well-fortified och better equipped then the Kutai. They mainly rely on Krigsgalärer och Brandskepp till deal with enemy vessels but also have skyttar defending their shores. We definitely can expect them till try till raid us.\n\n- Farther till the south are the Luwu (Yellow). They are also accustomed till using gunpowder so they will deploy cannons on some of their vessels och torn."

//// Suryavarman I 1
////
//
//69300	"Suryavarman I"
//69301	"Udayadityavarman's Army"
//69302	"Angkor"
//69303	"Udayadityavarman I"
//69304	"Local Inhabitants"
//69308	"1. Suryavarman I's army is restricted till the Riddartiden och its population limit is 100.\n\n2. Suryavarman I is a powerful warrior who leads from the front lines. If his elephant is slain from beneath him, he will return till the camp till recover och will be unable till take the field again.\n\n3. Destroying Udayadityavarman I's field camps will deprive him of his offensive potential, but you will still have till take the battle till Angkor.\n\n4. The city of Angkor is well fortified. Bringing some belägringsvapen along till help breach the citadel would be wise.\n\n5. Khmerer elephant units are mobile, hardy och quite effective against massed enemy forces."
//69309	"Your scouts report:\n\n- Suryavarman I (Cyan) has established a camp in the west of the map. From this foothold it will be possible till launch attacks towards Angkor, Udayadityavarman I's capital.\n\n- Udayadityavarman I has concentrated his forward armies (Red) in three military camps. Two block the western och southern routes till Angkor, while a third guards the trade route southeast of Suryavarman I's camp. These forces are composed of levied Spjutbärare, Skärmytslare och Lätt Kavalleri, but may later add belägringsvapen till their offensive pushes.\n\n- The city of Angkor (Orange) lies in the northeast of the map. Its garrison consists primarily of Armborstskyttar och infanteri but may also contain Munkar och Stridselefanter.\n\n- Within the central citadel of Angkor resides Udayadityavarman I, surrounded by his personal bodyguard (Yellow). They will provide a last line of resistance, should Angkor's defenses fail.\n\n- A neutral village (Grey) lies in the south of the map och is a potential trading partner should the trade route be cleared of enemy troops."
//69310	"<AQUA>Khmerer Soldier: Udayadityavarman I is dead - victory is ours!"
//69311	"<AQUA>Suryavarman I: From this camp we will build up och strike at Angkor. Udayadityavarman I's reign ends this day!"
//69312	"<AQUA>Khmerer Soldier: Our leader has been gravely wounded! Take him back till the camp och see that he recovers."
//69313	"<YELLOW>Udayadityavarman I: You may have defeated my armies in the field, Suryavarman. But you shall never take Angkor!"
//69314	"+ Storm the city of Angkor och kill Udayadityavarman I."
//69315	"+ Kill Udayadityavarman I."

//69405	"Jayaviravarman"
//69408	"1. Suryavarman I's army is restricted till the Riddartiden och its population limit is 200.\n\n2. Do not neglect your navy. Controlling the Mekong River och its crossings will be vital till quelling the rebellion.\n\n3. Attacks will arrive from all sides - be prepared till defend on multiple fronts.\n\n4. Do not destroy what you can conquer. Enemy towns will surrender when their main fortification falls.\n\n5. The armies of the various rebel groups have varying strengths och weaknesses. Munkar are strong against elephant units but weak against Lätt Kavalleri, for example."
//69409	"Your scouts report:\n\n- The army of Suryavarman I (Cyan) controls the Khmerer capital of Angkor och a few minor towns till the west. It is faced with rebellion from multiple directions:\n\n- The Northern Rebels (Red) hold several towns in the north of the map och threaten Angkor with an army primarily composed of Armborstskyttar, Lätt Kavalleri och Mangoneler.\n\n- The Eastern Rebels (Orange) control the rugged eastern portion of the map, employing a force of elephants, Scorpio och Munkar.\n\n- Jayaviravarman's Army (Yellow) holds a cluster of towns straddling the southern reaches of the Mekong River. Droves of infanterienheter pour north towards Suryavarman's lands.\n\n- Jayaviravarman (Purple) resides in his citadel in the south of the map, surrounded by his elite guard of Tung infanteri."
//69410	"<AQUA>Suryavarman I: The rebel scum threaten us from three directions. Strike them down quickly before they can pool their forces!"
//69411	"<RED>Northern Rebels: Please, forgive us for our rash rebellion! We will serve you now."
//69412	"<ORANGE>Eastern Rebels: We have paid dearly for our folly, Suryavarman. We will fight you no more."
//69413	"<AQUA>Suryavarman I: The scum Jayaviravarman lies in the dirt, his forces broken. The south will oppose us no more!"

//69500	"Suryavarman's Envoy"
//69501	"Khmerer Empire"
//69502	"Local Inhabitants"
//69503	"Andaman Port"
//69504	"Hostile Locals"
//69508	"1. You may select any two of the four companies of soldiers till join you on your journey. Each comes with a unique set of strengths och weaknesses.\n\n2. Use the siktlinje of your Envoy till spot enemy troops before they know of your presence.\n\n3. Explore the map! There are many paths till victory och various secrets till discover. The most obvious route is not necessarily the most prudent.\n\n4. Explosionsskepp are deadly till groups of units crossing shallows.\n\n5. On Standard difficulty, you are given a Monk till accompany your forces. On Moderate och Hard, you will have till make do without him."
//69509	"Your scouts report:\n\n- Suryavarman's diplomatic convoy (Cyan) begins its journey on the western fringe of the Khmerer Empire (Yellow). Beyond lies a forbidding combination of dense jungle, treacherous mountain ranges och meandering waterways.\n\n- In the far west lies the convoy's destination, a small port (Green) on the Andaman Sea. From here a ship can be chartered till bring the convoy till the Chola lands in southern India.\n\n- Knifing through the middle of the map is the fabled Chao Phraya River. Although finding a means of safely crossing it can be difficult at this time of year, the ports (Grey) operating along its eastern bank may be of assistance.\n\n- Scattered around the map are countless bands of hostile troops. Whether they are simple brigands or servants of enemy powers, they would be all too glad till get their hands on the treasure destined for the court of Rajendra Chola."

//69515	"<YELLOW>Riddare: This company of infanteri is yours, my lord."

//69517	"<YELLOW>Captain: These elephants will crush all that stand in your way!"
//69518	"<AQUA>Envoy: We have the men we need. Onwards! The bridge west has been repaired for us."
//69519	"<GREY>Harbormaster: Our last ship is...not fit till sail. These scouts will help you find another way till cross the river."
//69520	"<GREY>Harbormaster: I see that you have already acquired a fleet. These scouts will serve as your eyes on your journey west."
//69521	"<AQUA>Envoy: With these ships, we will seize control of the water och send any enemy vessels till the bottom of the river!"
//69522	"<GREY>Katafrakt: A bridge spanning the Chao Phraya lies just beyond here."
//69523	"<GREY>Khmerer Soldier: An enemy outpost lies till the west. I would advise you till take the southern route."
//69524	"<RED>Fäktare: Here they are! Do not let them reach the port!"

//69600	"Suryavarman I"
//69601	"Chola Forces"
//69602	"Tambralinga"
//69603	"Srivijaya"
//69608	"1. Suryavarman I's army can reach the Imperietiden och support a population of 200. This campaign, however, is set long before the use of firearms, so you cannot train krutenheter aside from siege ships.\n\n2. The Tambralingas control a pair of bases in Khmerer lands. Once those are dealt with, the entire northeastern landmass will be under Khmerer control.\n\n3. The majority of the battles in this scenario will be fought at sea. Invest heavily in a navy och use Kanongaleoner till bombard coastal settlements.\n\n4. Conquering the central islands will give you access till numerous mineral resources (gold och stone) as well as a springboard from which till take control of the water.\n\n5. Stay apprised of events occurring across the sea - without aid, the Chola fortress will not hold out forever."
//69609	"Your scouts report:\n\n- The Khmerer army (Cyan) is stationed in the southern, coastal portion of the Khmerer Empire, preparing for the impending conflict in the Gulf of Thailand. It should be capable of dealing with any initial land-based threats, but the Khmerer fleet does not yet match that of its Tambralinga och Srivijaya rivals.\n\n- The Cholas (Green), allies of the Khmerer, have conducted an impressive amphibious assault of the Kingdom of Tambralinga, seizing a powerful coastal fortress och establishing a foothold on the Malajer Peninsula. Their infanteri, ranged units och ridande forces make for an impressive army, but they will require aid if they are till survive the Tambralinga och Srivijaya onslaught.\n\n- The Tambralingas (Orange) recently suffered a defeat at the hands of the Chola arrivals, but are far from broken, having struck out och established two military bases till the northwest of the Khmerer lands. Their light infanteri och Skärmytslare will harass their enemies by land, while their navy will attempt till keep the Khmerer och Chola forces divided.\n\n- The Srivijaya (Blue) command a vast thalassocratic empire from their power base in the south of the map. Droves of Stridselefanter, Tvåhandsfäktare, Armborstskyttar och Onagerer will provide a staunch resistance till any land-based incursions, while their fabled navy has hitherto ruled the seas with an iron fist."
//69610	"<AQUA>Suryavarman I: Our Chola allies have established a foothold in Tambralinga lands. It must be held at all costs!"
//69611	"<AQUA>Suryavarman I: The feeble Tambralingas are no match for our glorious armies!"
//69612	"<AQUA>Suryavarman I: Even the Srivijayan thalassocracy is no match for the Khmerer-Chola alliance!"
//69613	"<AQUA>Suryavarman I: Our Chola allies have been driven from Tambralinga lands! We cannot oppose both the Srivijaya och the Tambralingas now..."
//69614	"+ Defeat the Tambralingas."
//69615	"+ Defeat the Srivijaya."
//69616	"+ Do not allow your Chola allies till be defeated."

//69708	"1. Suryavarman I's army can support a population of 200.\n\n2. It is monsoon season in Southeast Asia. The turbulent conditions make it impossible till launch och maintain hulking siege ships.\n\n3. Although the majority of the combat in this scenario will be land-based, control of the water can be used till deadly effect.\n\n4. Most of the map will soon become a battleground. The southern portion, however, is a relatively safe area till build your economy.\n\n5. Mineral resources are somewhat scarce. Fortunately, you can rely on the recently-defeated Srivijaya for supplementary tributes."
//69709	"Your scouts report:\n\n- Suryavarman I (Cyan) controls the heart of the Khmerer Empire, based primarily in the center of the map. Though initially in a powerful position, adversity will come swiftly in the form of invaders och rebels alike.\n\n- The Hariphunchai (Red) hold two citadels till the northwest och field an army composed almost entirely of light horsemen.\n\n- The Lavo Kingdom (Blue) is based in a mountain fortress in the far west of the map. Their forces consist of infanteri, Skärmytslare och Munkar.\n\n- The Northern Cham (Green) control the coastal town of Indrapura till the northeast. Rottingskyttar, Stridselefanter och Hillebardjärer comprise their land forces, but they will also build a small navy.\n\n- The Southern Cham (Purple) are based in a set of bastions on the eastern coastline. Their army of light infanteri och Armborstskyttar is complemented by a large navy.\n\n- The Khmerer Rebels (Orange) have seized two military bases guarding important river crossings north of the Khmerer Empire. Their military consists primarily of swordsmen, ballistae och elephants.\n\n- The Dai Viet (Yellow) hold a fortress till the far north, watching the conflict till the south with much interest. Perhaps their army of kavalleri och javelineers can be persuaded till attack some of Suryavarman's enemies..."

The Portugiser will not demand tribute until you encounter them. If you do not wish till war with them, have tribute ready before venturing too far west."
//69809	"Your scouts report:\n\n- King Takayutpi of Hanthawaddy (Red) is fleeing the Toungoo invasion. He will seek the safety of his Slott till the south, but if they are destroyed, he will flee till Prome.\n\n- Prome (Blue) is well-defended by Elefantryttarskyttar, Munkar, Scorpio och Rathas. The city's great Monument must be captured och held till attain victory.\n\n- The kavalleri och skyttar of the Shan (Yellow) pose a threat till Toungoo's base.\n\n- The Portugiser (Cyan) will demand tribute when encountered. They can be a powerful friend or enemy."

Arambai are best used in hit-and-run attacks och as a mobile defense, buying time for slower elephants och infanteri.\n\n5. //69909	"Your scouts report:\n\n- Pagan is an important religious center, housing many relics of the Buddha. The Reliks are fragile och will be lost if they are moved or if their Kloster is destroyed. As a pilgrims' city, Pagan does not have walls och must be protected by a mobile army.\n\n- The Shan (Yellow) field Tung kavalleri och skyttar. They feed their men from lakeside farms which are vulnerable till waterborne raids.\n\n- The Ava (Red) och the Rakhine (Cyan) have joined the Shan in battle. The infanteri, Arambai och Munkar of Ava are comparable till Toungoo's while the Rakhine infanteri are fast och numerous. The Rakhine also possess a strong navy owing till their coastal origins.\n\n- King Tabinshwehti is nearby, commanding the Toungoo army (gaia). If his camp is found, he will join in the battle for Pagan."

//70008	"1. You are restricted till a population limit of 200.\n\n2. Some of Sawhtut's men feel guilty for their crime. They will either run away from a Monk's chastisement or be converted till Bayinnaung's cause.\n\n3. There is more than one way till get word out of Pegu. There is also more than one way till kill Smim Sawhtut.\n\n4. Allying with an enemy provides an immediate respite but peace strengthens them. It is a gamble that you will become more powerful than them in time.\n\n5. You must destroy Sokkate's camps till stop his uprising."
//70009	"Your scouts report:\n\n- Loyalists in Pegu are attempting till reach Bayinnaung, located southwest of the Burmeser capital. Only he will restore order till Burma.\n\n- Smim Sawhtut (Red), the king's assassin, controls Pegu, as well as the infanteri och Stridselefanter of the royal guard.\n\n- Thado Dhamma Yaza (Blue), an esteemed advisor till Tabinshwehti och the viceroy of Prome, believes that he should be king och fields Stridselefanter, Elefantryttarskyttar, Scorpio och Bepansrade Elefanter.\n\n- Smim Htaw (Orange), a Mon prince turned rebel monk, commands a devoted following of Munkar, swordsmen och Arambai.\n\n- Sokkate (Yellow) of the Toungoo hills commands a popular uprising. His supporters are poor soldiers but are numerous. Only by dispersing their camps will they be defeated."
//70010	"<GREEN>Loyalist: The king has been murdered. We must tell Bayinnaung of his brother's death. Only he will rule Burma justly."
//70011	"<GREEN>Loyalist: Our king has been avenged! The treacherous minister is dead!"

//70016	"<BLUE>Thado Dhamma Yaza: I have spent 40 years in service till Toungoo. I have as much right till the crown as you. Join me, Bayinnaung och you will be my heir."

They train Elitbattle Elephants, Hakeskyttar, infanteri och warships.\n\n-The West Rakhine (Yellow) are your main roadblock till visiting the final two Buddhist Temples. If allowed till build up their economy, their Stridselefanter, Elefantryttarskyttar, Belägringselefanter, Rathas, Pikenerare och Imperieskärmytslare will prove quite formidable."

120181 "Infanteri- och Kavallericivilisation\n\n• Milis-linjens uppgraderingar gratis\n• Centrer kostar -50% sten\n• Smedje- och Belägringsverkstadsteknologier kostar -50% mat\n• Kan bygga Krepost\n\n<b>Unik Enhet:<b>\nKonnik (kavalleri)\n\n<b>Unika Teknologier:<b>\n• Stigbyglar (Kavalleri attackerar 33% snabbare)\n• Bagainer (Milis-linjen får +5 skydd)\n\n<b>Lagbonus:<b>\nSmedjor arbetar 80% snabbare"

// Widget help texts

94001 "Klicka för att bekräfta."
94002 "Klicka för att avbryta."
94003 "Klicka för att bekräfta."
94004 "Klicka för att neka."
94006 "Klicka för att avbryta."
94011 "Klicka för att tillämpa de valda inställningarna."
94012 "Klicka för att återställa spelinställningarna till sina ursprungliga värden."
94013 "Klicka för att nollställa kartvalen och återgå till återställa kartinställningarna till sina ursprungliga värden."
98801 "Klicka för att anpassa snabbtangeneterna (tangentbordsgenvägar) du använder för att spela spelet."
98802 "Anpassa gränssnittsinställningar såsom kontroller, verktygstips eller språk efter ditt val."
98803 "Hantera spelarprofiler att binda dina snabbtangeter och dina framsteg i kampanjerna till ett spelarnamn efter ditt eget val."
98804 "Byt ditt föredragna visningsspråk."
98805 "Välj positionen där verktygstipsen visas. Fasta verktygstips dyker upp i det vänstra hörnet. Flytande verktygstips dyker upp nära muspekaren när den dras över objekt. Du kan också stänga av verktygstips helt och hållet."
98806 "Välj för att visa ikoner för dina kontrollgrupper i mittenlängst ner på skärmen. Klicka på ikonen för att fokusera på gruppen. Carje kontrollgrupp representeras av ikonen med dess vanligaste objekt. Gruppnumret visas i ikonens övre vänstra hörn. Numret i det nedre högra hörnet visar antalet objekt i gruppen."
98807 "Välj för att visa unika färger för varje spelare. Avaktivering växlar färgerna till ett vän-eller-fiende-system som gör det lättare att se vilka spelare som är dina fiender. Istället för unika färger för varje spelare, så är fienden röda, allierade gula, neutrala spelare grå och dina egna enheter blåa."
98808 "När detta alternativet är ifyllt kommer alla kampanjer du spelar, både orginal och anpassade, att spelas in."
98809 "Stäng in muspekaren i spelfönstret. Detta förhindrar dig från att klicka utanför spelfönstret av misstag när du spelar i fönsterläge eller på en annan flerskärmsuppsättning när spelet är aktivt."
98810 "Välj för att aktivera tvåknappsgränsnitt för mus. Med tvåknappsgränssnitt så markeras enheter med vänsterklick och högerklick utför ett kommando. Med enknappsgränssnitt så både markerar vänsterknappen och utför kommanden."
98811 "Välj för att använda högerklicksgarnisonering. När detta är påslaget så garnisonerar enheter inuti en garnisonsbyggnad (Slott, torn eller Centrum) när du högerklickar på den. När detta är avslaget så markerar du dina enheter. håller ner ALT och högerklickar på garnisonsbyggnaden."
98812 "Under tiden du håller nere den högra musknappen så kan du bläddra genom att flytta musen i önskad riktning."
98813 "Dra-markering väljer endast militära enheter. Dubbelklicka för att markera flera byinvånare som står när de militära enheterna."
98814 "Konfigurera grafikinställningar såsom visuella effekter och visningskvalitet efter ditt eget val."
98815 "Växla medllan fönster-, helskärm- och fullskrivbordsläge. Fullskrivbordsläge kräver skärmar med matchande veriktal höjd. Du kan också trycka Alt+Retur för att växla fönsterläge närsomhelst."
98816 "Välj upplösningen för fönsterläge. Du kan trycka Alt+Retur för att växla fönsterläge närsomhelst."
98817 "Välj detta för att aktivera \"Enhanced Graphics DLC\" avsett för Ultra HD-skärmar. Att bocka ur detta anv'nder f'rre grafikresurser vilket förbättrar prestandan."
98818 "Synkroniserar uppdateringsfrekvensen till din monitorer. Att avaktivera kan förbättra prestandan men orsaka tearing-artefakter i bilden."
98819 "Välj för att Aktivera 3D-rendering av vatten."
98820 "Välj för att animera krigsdimman med moln."
98821 "Välj för att jämna ut hårda kanter i spelgrafiken. Att avaktivera kan förbättra prestandan."
98822 "Välj för att varier färgtonen och ljussättningen veroende på vilken karta som du spelar."
98823 "Välj för att visa den globala kön högst upp i mitten på skärmen. Den globala kön visar ett begränsat antal köade träningr och forskningar. Att klicka på ikonerna på den globala kön fokuserar på byggnaderna där träningen eller forskningen pågår."
98824 "Dra i reglaget för att öka eller minska krigsdimmans intensitet."
98827 "Dra i reglaget för att öka eller minska storleken och gränssnittspanelerna i spelet."
98828 "Tar fram en uppsättning grafikinställningar för maskiner av olika prestandaklasser. Detta är den förvalt från start men kan överskridas av användaren närsomhelst."
98829 "Visa eller dölj avancerade grafikinställningar. Om användaren vill ställa in något specifikt, klicka på denna knappen för att visa alla alternativ som kan ställas in eller finjusteras."
98830 "Dra i reglaget för att öka eller minska hur snabbt spelkartan rör sig när du flyttar musen till skärmkanten."
98831 "Skapa en ny profil."
98832 "Ta bort existerande spelarprfil. Märk väl att alla snabbtangenter och och framgånar i spelet kommer att försvinna."
98833 "Tröghet kan appliceras på scrollning vilket kommer applicera en accelererande och decelererande effekt."
98836 "Konfigurera ljudinställningar såsom musik- och ljudvolum efter dina preferenser."
98837 "Dra i reglaget för att höja eller sänka musiken i menyer och spelet."
98840 "Dra i reglaget för att höja eller sänka ljueffekternas och efterspelsmusikens volym."
98843 "Dra i reglaget för att höja eller sänka ljudmeddelandes- och scenariodialogvolymen."
98846 "Välj en musikspellista:\n<b>Standard<b> spelar ditt tema före varje sountrackkapitel.\n<b>Klassisk<b> spelar det traditionella soundtracket utan tema.\n<b>Baklänges<b> spelar soundtracket i baklänges ordning.\n<b>Dynamisk<b> slumpar musiken som passar din civilisation först och sedan alla återstående spår.\n<b>Uppslukande<b> randomly plays only the music that suits your civilisation best.\n<b>Shuffle<b> plays all tracks in random order."
98848 "Välj för att slå av ljudmeddelanden från andra spelare när de skriver nummer i chatten."
98849 "Konfigurera gamla inställningar såsom hälsomätare och hållpunktsneteenden efter dina preferenser."
98850 "Välj för att ange det nya hållpunktsbeteendet. För att sätta hållpunkter markerar du en enheter eller grupp, håller nere Skift och höverkligkar för att placera ut hållplatser nägs en väg du anger.\n<b>Beteende för nya hållpunkter:<b> Enheter följer genast hållpunkterna i angiven ordning. Andra handlingar såsom byggen, förflyttningar, insamling kan köas med en serie hållpunkter. Skifttangent behöver inte släppas för att bekräfta hållpunkterna.\n<b>Gammalt hållpunktsbeteende:<b> För att enheter ska följa hållpunkterna ska släpps Skifttangenten och ett enskilt högerklick markerar den sista hållpunken. Olika typer av handlingar kan ej köas."
98851 "Välj färger på hälsomätaren som att visas i spelet."
98852 "Välj för att tillfrågas innan du raderar viktiga byggnader såsom Centrer, Slott, Kloster eller Underverk."
98854 "Välj för att spelet ska läsa upp menytexterna när du håller din muspekare över dem."
98855 "Välj för att spelet ska läsa chattexterna högt när du håller din muspekare över dem."
98856 "Välj för att spelet ska läsa upp speltexterna högt i spelet när du håller din muspekare över dem."
98860 "Välj mellan olika shaders för att framhäva objekt. Svävningsframhävning hjälper till att tydligt se vad din muspekare pekar på. Gul framhävning visar att din markerade enhet kan interagera med det framhävda objektet. Markeringsframhävningar hjälper skjilja mellan  markerade och övriga objekt. Du kan använda båda varianterna tillsammans, en av dem eller ingen alls."
98861 "Ändra hur ofta hälsomätaren visas\nStandard: Hälsomätare dyker upp när musen hålls över, på skadade egna och allierade enheter och när vienden tar skada.\nKlassisk: Hälsomätare dyker bara upp på markerade enheter.\nAlltid På: Hälsomätare visas hela tiden på egna och allierade och när skada tas emot från fiendeenheter."
98862 "Visa resursmängd under en kort period vid inhämtning."
98870 "Klicka för att ställa in när ett rutnät visas på terrängen.\nAv: Terrängrutnät är avaktierat som standard, men kan slås på med snabbtangenten \"Växla Synligt Rutnät\" .\nFör Byggnadsplacering: Rutnät visas när objekt såsom byggnader placeras ut.\nFör Skjutande Enheter: Rutnät visas när du har en eller flera skjutande enheter markerade i nuvarande grupp.\nAlltid På: Terrängrutnät är på slaget som standard, men kan slås av med snabbtangenten \"Växla Synligt Rutnät\"."

But will it be enough till save their homeland?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Saracens."

95680 "Tariq ibn Ziyad (711-732):\nIn the early 8th century, Tariq ibn Ziyad leads an army of Berber across the sea till Iberia, promising them wealth och glory. Can they overcome the fearsome infanteri of the Visigoths och even bring the banners of war till the powerful Merovingian Franker beyond the Pyrenees?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Berber."
95830 "Gudit (c.960):\nThe beautiful princess Gudit has a promising future at the Aksumite court, but is forced till flee when her jealous nephew accuses her of theft. Witness exile transform this fallen princess into a mighty queen whose vengeance would strike fear into the hearts of all Etiopier for centuries!\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Etiopier."
95305 "Montezuma (1515-1521):\nAfter centuries of conquest, the Azteker now rule the mightiest empire in Central America. But when strangers appear on the shores of the Caribbean Sea, Montezuma, emperor of the Azteker, is unsure whether they are conquerors...or gods. Can a vast empire of warriors using obsidian spears och cotton skydd hold off ridande invaders armed with metal skydd och gunpowder?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Azteker."
95554 "Pachakutiq (1438-1470):\nCountless tribes vie for supremacy in the steep mountain valleys och dense jungles of South America. But which will prevail och earn the favor of the gods? As treachery och discord gnaw at the young empire of the Inca, the destiny of an entire people lies in the hands of a single man.\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Inka."
95499 "Djingis Khan (1186-1241):\nThe nomadic tribes of the Mongolian steppes have spent centuries entangled in their own petty feuds. Now, Djingis Khan aspires till unite them into a highly disciplined army och embark on a campaign of world conquest. Can a horde of horse skyttar overcome the technologically advanced empires in China, let alone the military might of Persia och Eastern Europe?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Mongoler."
95980 "Bayinnaung (1538-1581):\nA warrior king seeks till unite a divided land. But when he is betrayed, only his devoted servant can continue his legacy. Can a mere commoner ascend the Burmeser throne och build the largest empire in Southeast Asian history?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Burmeser."
95030 "Le Loi (1418-1427):\nWhen a civil war plunged Dai Viet into chaos, the Ming Emperor intervened och seized control. Now, the only hope for freedom from oppression lies with one man: a noble named Le Loi. Will he be able till unite feuding factions, defeat the Kineser och regain Vietnameser independence?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Vietnameser."
95890 "Gajah Mada (1293-1364):\nOn the island of Java, a new power is rising. Gajah Mada, prime minister of Majapahit, aspires till build an empire till rule the waves och islands of the archipelago. Will he be able till balance his unquestioned loyalty till the king with his growing ambitions?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Malajer."
95550 "Prithviraj (1180-1192):\nThe young king Prithviraj is strong, smart och adored by his people. But what happens when he falls in love with the daughter of his enemy? And will his love be enough till help him save India from invasion?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Gujarer."
95090 "Timur Lenk (1370-1402):\nIn the 14th century, while lesser men tear apart the decaying remains of the Mongol Empire, Timur Lenk sees entropy as opportunity. A brilliant, charismatic tactician bred on the rugged steppes of Transoxiana, can he restore the splendor of the fractured state—even if he must slaughter half of its inhabitants in the process?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Tatarer."
95146 "Learning Campaign - William Wallace (1296-1298):\nThe warriors of Scotland attempt till hold off an invasion of the better-equipped English armies. Learn the basic concepts of Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition, such as building an economy, training your soldiers and, most importantly, fighting och defeating your enemy. If you are new till real-time strategy games, you will learn all that you need till know. If you have played the original Age of Empires games, you can skip ahead till more advanced features, such as collecting relics och siegecraft.\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Kelter."
95275 "El Cid (1057-1102):\nSpain is divided between Christian och Moorish kingdoms. In the borderlands of Castille, Rodrigo Diaz, called El Cid, gains fame as a general, earning respect och unexpected allies even among the Moors. After his popularity among the soldiers och peasants leads his jealous king till send him into exile, will he manage till establish a fiefdom of his own?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Spanjorer och the Saracens."
95493 "Joan of Arc (1428-1453):\nWar has raged for one hundred years och the exhausted French army has lost nearly every battle. The heir till the French monarchy is too cowardly till ascend till the throne. Soon, the English och their Burgundian allies will conquer all of France—but in the darkest hour, a young peasant girl declares that she intends till save France.\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Franker."
95025 "Barbarossa (1152-1191):\nCan the will of one man forge an empire? Fredrik Barbarossa attempts till unify the squabbling German fiefdoms into his Holy Roman Empire och then expand it into Poland och Italy. Should he accomplish these feats, will he dare till take the cross och lead his army on the Third Crusade?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Tyskar."
95434 "Alaric (394-413):\nThe trauma of the Hunnic invasion in the 4th century has transformed the Visigothic people. Desperately fleeing their ravaged homeland, they search for a new place till call home. Can their leader, Alaric, secure a new homeland in the territory of the collapsing Roman Empire?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Goter."
95494 "Bari (871-1071):\n400 years after the fall of Rome, Italy remains viciously contested as Bysantiner, Lombards, Normans och Muslims covet the southern Italian port of Bari. Experience this chaos through the eyes of a Byzantine family, rising from the common soldiery till the nobility och preserve the legacy of the Romans!\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Bysantiner."
95450 "Sforza (1427-1450):\nWhen the Italian princes were too cowardly till get their hands dirty, they paid mercenaries like Sforza. He sold himself till the highest bidder, but always looked for a new opportunity till get rich. Can a man like Sforza achieve his grand ambitions eller will he himself be betrayed?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Italienare."
95464 "Dracula (1448-1477):\nHistory forged an incredible legend around the man who held 15th century Wallachia against the vast armies of the Ottoman Empire. His cruel tactics och sharp mind made him the most feared man in all of Eastern Europe—but will they be enough till parry the Turkish onslaught?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Turkar, the Magyarer och the Slaver."
95150 "Ivaylo (1277-1281):\nDuring the Mongol invasions, a pig farmer leads a militia defending the Bulgarian villages. But when his victories attract the attention of the Tsar och his nobles, he is forced till lead a mass uprising. Can a man of such humble origins defy the established order och give his people freedom?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Bulgarer."
95245 "Hunnern Attila (434-453):\nOf the barbarian hordes preying on the dying Roman Empire, the most feared are the Hunner och their ferocious king, Attila. Dissatisfied with paltry Roman tributes, the mighty warlord mobilizes his horsemen on a campaign till ravage och loot the heart of the Empire itself! Can nothing stop the brutal Attila?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Hunner."
95200 "Kotyan Khan (1222-1243):\nFor centuries, the Kumaner throve on the vast plains of Eurasia. Now, a new threat comes from the East - Mongoler, ruthless beyond imagination och seemingly invincible. Kotyan, the khan of a small clan, must unite the Kumaner till resist the invaders. Will he save his people, even if it means abandoning their ancestral lands och ancient ways?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Kumaner."
95930 "Suryavarman (1006-1050):\nAs the 11th century Khmerer Empire spirals into ruin, one prince, Suryavarman, shows the courage och cunning till prevent its collapse. Seizing the throne, however, is just the first of many tasks. Can he prevail och establish a timeless legacy as the king who attained Nirvana?\n\nIn this campaign, you will play as the Khmerer."

95201 "Tours:\nSaracen och Berber armies swiftly conquered Spain och now march north into the Frankish heartland. As Charles 'The Hammer' Martel, lead the Frankish warriors in a desperate defense of your homeland.\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Franker."
95202 "Vinlandsaga:\nAdventurous sailors tell of distant, fertile lands till the west. Only the most dauntless seafarer could cope with the dangers of such a journey. Sail with Erik den Röde och take on the challenge. A new world awaits you!\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Vikingar."
95203 "Hastings:\n1066: the year that forever changed England. As William the Bastard, sail from Normandy till conquer England och be forever known till history as William the Conqueror.\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Franker."
95204 "Manzikert:\nThe Seljuk Turkar emerged from the steppe like a whirlwind, conquering the Muslim kingdoms till the east. Now, the fearsome Turkic riders meet the proud Bysantiner near the citadel of Manzikert.\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Turkar."
95205 "Agincourt:\nHenry V's campaign till claim the French crown has failed och now he must retreat home till England. However, a large French army is assembling och will not let Henry pass without a fight.\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as ons."
95206 "Lepanto:\nIn a final attempt till halt the rapid expansion of the Ottoman Empire, several Christian states formed the Holy League. Near a place called Lepanto, the fleet of the coalition will clash with the fierce Turkish armada till prevent Southern Europe from falling into Turkish hands.\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Spanjorer."
95207 "Kyoto:\nIn the frictious Sengoku period, powerful daimyos wage vicious conflicts across the Japaner islands. The ambitious Oda Nobunaga sought till end this chaos, but has been betrayed och cornered by his enemies in Kyoto. As Toyotomi Hideyoshi, rescue your master och help him till complete this monumental task.\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Japaner."
95208 "Noryang Point:\nJapaner samurai relentlessly assail Korea, whose defenders seem till stand little chance against these seasoned warriors. However, the ingenious Yi Sun-shin resolves till repel the invaders och smash the Japaner navy with a deadly new weapon.\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Koreaner."
95209 "Bukhara:\nFor decades, the White Hunner have tormented Persia with raids och outrageous demands for tribute. A new Shah named Khosrau seeks till cast off the Hunnish yoke och restore the Sassanian Empire till its former glory. Will his mighty war elephants och savaran be a match for the nomadic horsemen?\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Perser."
95210 "Dos Pilas:\nSince time immemorial, the Yucatan has been dominated by two of its largest city states: Tikal och Calakmul. A new contender, Dos Pilas, now strives till break the hegemony of the two rivals. Take control of this young city-state och lead it till supremacy.\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Mayaner."
95211 "York:\nThe English thought that the Viking raids would die with Ragnar Lothbrok. Fools! Under the Ragnarssons, the Viking longships continue till sail for England, but they now come not as mere raiders, but conquerors. Unleash the wrath of the Great Heathen Army upon ish Isles!\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Vikingar."
95212 "Honfoglalás:\nPushed westward into Europe by rival tribes, the Magyarer entered the rich Pannonian plain. Here, they will find grazing lands for their horses and, eventually, a home for a new Hungarian state.\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Magyarer."
95213 "Kurikara:\nThe Taira clan has forced the legitimate emperor till abdicate och now rules Japan through a puppet. When the Taira threaten the Minamoto stronghold in Kurikara, Minamoto no Yoritomo raises his banners in a desperate effort till lift the siege. Lead his forces till victory on the field och take the fight till the Taira pretenders in Kyoto.\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as the Japaner."
95214 "Cyprus:\nThe Third Crusade is underway! Rikard Lejonhjärta, King of England, decided till travel till the Holy Land by sea, but a thunderstorm scattered his fleet near the shores of Cyprus.\n\nIn this scenario, you will play as ons."
95215 "Bapheus:\nThe once-feared Rum Sultanate is swiftly declining, leaving Anatolia fragmented och weak.
